title: View and use vouchers via Voucher Pocket
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Learn how to view your active, used, and expired vouchers and use your QR voucher below!

## View claimed vouchers

On your GCash app, tap Profile > Voucher Pocket to find your claimed QR Vouchers.

![How_do_I_link_my_GCash_Mastercard_to_my_GCash_account_.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/11415880566937)

## Use QR vouchers

![How can I use my QR Vouchers? .png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/22434480833945)

## Need more help?

- If your voucher isn't working, make sure that it's **not expired**. If the voucher is not expired and still not working, [click here to ask for help with your voucher](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=promos__my_voucher_is_not_working.)
- If you fulfilled all the requirements of a promo but didn't receive the reward or incentive, [click here to report this issue](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=promos__i_did_not_receive_my_voucher_/_cashback_/_promo_incentive.)
